nodes.text: One Grand Vygoth of the Wandering Star was a male Pau'an who held the title for a long period of time. Cli Pastayra, who believed the Vygoth's old age had led to the syndicate's deterioration, hoped to overthrow him and take his place. Both Pastayra and the Grand Vygoth were murdered during an auction on Cantonica by Fyzen Gor and his droids.
